thread.title: Thank Gauri for love, patience: SRK on wedding anniversary
thread.title_full: Thank Gauri for love, patience: SRK on wedding anniversary - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Thank Gauri for love, patience: SRK on wedding anniversary
text:
Shah Rukh Khan expressed his gratitude to wife Gauri for showing "love, patience and perseverance" to mark the couple's 24 years of marriage.
Also read: A day on the sets of Rohit Shetty's 'Dilwale' in Hyderabad 

Shah Rukh Khan with wife Gauri Khan 
Shah Rukh, 49, tied the knot with Gauri, 45, in 1991 after eight years of courtship.
The couple are parents to Ayan, 18, Suhana, 15, and two-year-old AbRam.
The 'Chennai Express' star took to Twitter to shower praise on Gauri.
"Thanks for all your wishes. Bt Thanks is due to Gauri, for 32 yrs or Patience Perseverance Forgiveness love and three beautiful kids," he wrote.
